sidebar.title: Settings
sidebar.about_text: A learning project for exploring Google Gemini Pro Image capabilities.

basic.title: Basic Image Generation
basic.prompt_placeholder: Describe the image you want to generate...
basic.no_image: No image was generated. Please try a different prompt.

examples.title: Example Prompts
items: A cute corgi wearing sunglasses, sitting on a beach at sunset, photorealistic
A futuristic cityscape with flying cars and neon lights, cyberpunk style
A cozy coffee shop interior with warm lighting, watercolor painting style
A majestic dragon flying over snow-capped mountains, fantasy art

chat.title: Chat & Refine
chat.description: Have a conversation to iteratively refine your image. Start with a basic idea and improve it step by step.
chat.welcome: Welcome! Describe the image you'd like to create, and I'll help you refine it.
chat.new_session_tip: Start a new chat to begin generating images.

refine_tips.title: Refinement Tips
items: Try: 'Change the background to a forest'
Try: 'Add more details to the face'

blend.title: Style Transfer & Image Blending
blend.description: Transfer artistic styles between images or blend multiple images together.

style.title: Style Transfer
style.description: Apply the artistic style from one image to another.
style.default_prompt: Apply the artistic style from the second image to the first image

multi.title: Multi-Image Blending
multi.description: Blend multiple images into one coherent scene. Supports up to 14 images.
multi.prompt_placeholder: Describe how you want to combine these images...

search.title: Search-Grounded Generation
search.description: Generate images based on real-time search data. Perfect for current events, weather, and trending topics.
search.prompt_placeholder: Describe what you want to visualize with current information...
search.info: This mode uses Google Search to gather real-time information before generating the image.

examples.title: Example Prompts
items: Visualize the current weather forecast for the next 5 days in New York as a modern infographic
Create an image showing the top 3 trending movies this week
Generate a visual summary of today's major tech news
Illustrate the current stock market trends as a creative chart

templates.title: Prompt Templates
templates.description: Start with curated prompt templates and customize them to your needs.
templates.prompt_placeholder: Select a template or enter your own...
templates.subject_placeholder: What is the main subject? (e.g., 'a golden retriever', 'vintage car')

portrait: professional headshot photo with studio lighting
artistic portrait with dramatic side lighting
vintage style portrait with film grain effect
product: clean product photography on white background
lifestyle product shot with natural lighting
minimalist product display with soft shadows
landscape: breathtaking mountain landscape at golden hour
serene beach sunset with palm trees silhouette
art: abstract oil painting with vibrant colors
watercolor illustration in soft pastel tones
digital art in cyberpunk neon style
food: gourmet food photography with elegant plating
rustic homemade dish on wooden table
colorful healthy breakfast spread from above
architecture: modern minimalist building with clean lines
cozy interior design with warm ambient lighting
futuristic architecture concept with glass and steel

history.title: Generation History
history.empty: No images generated yet. Start creating!
history.clear_confirm: Are you sure you want to clear all history?

errors.api_key_missing: API key not configured. Please set GOOGLE_API_KEY in your .env file.
errors.network_error: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.rate_limit: Rate limit exceeded. Please wait a moment and try again.
